reviewText:
When I ordered this I did not know what Region 2 meant but I sure know now.  Region 2 means the DVD cannot be
played on U.S. DVDs, at least not mine.  I wasted the money for it as it went in the trash.  It was ordered because
Ian McShane was in it but I'll never see it now.  Why this would be sold by Amazon and sold in the U.S. is a mystery
to me.  Beware..
